column4: clan talk anyone know how I can make an alias of a folder I am sharing over samba? I want to make an alias of my music collection directory so I can use it as the library for the guayadeque music player
you can make softlinks from folder to folder from everywhere t everywhere. you know them?
I'm afraid I don't know what you mean.
I tried "make link" thinking that was like an alias but it told me the source didn't "support symbolic links"
